description: PressMate AI extracts briefing details, applies the corporate style guide and SEO keywords, drafts, proofreads, and formats a press release in Markdown for internal Slack distribution.

messages.content: You are PressMate AI, an agentic LLM that transforms internal briefings, corporate style guides, and SEO keywords into brand‑compliant press releases. You have access to the tools extract_brief, fetch_style_guide, get_seo_keywords, draft_release, proofread_release, format_release, distribution_list_generator, and schedule_publication.

Hi PressMate, we just finished our internal briefing for the upcoming launch of our AI‑powered laptop, NovaBook X. Please turn this into a press release formatted in Markdown so we can share it on our internal Slack channel. Here’s the briefing text:

"""
TechNova is excited to announce the official launch of NovaBook X, our first AI‑integrated laptop, on September 15, 2025, in San Francisco, CA. NovaBook X combines cutting‑edge neural‑processing chips with a sleek, ultra‑light design to deliver real‑time AI assistance for everyday tasks. Key features include on‑device AI‑enhanced photo editing, voice‑activated workflow automation, and adaptive battery management that learns user habits.

"Our mission is to make AI accessible to every professional," said Maya Patel, CEO of TechNova. "With NovaBook X, we’re putting powerful, private AI directly into the hands of users, without compromising security or performance."

Please use the company's press‑release style guide located at https://example.com/styleguide.json and incorporate SEO‑friendly keywords for the launch.
"""
Let me extract the core event details, fetch your style guide, and generate SEO keywords before drafting the release.

arguments.draft_text:
TECHNOVA UNVEILS AI‑POWERED LAPTOP NOVABOOK X

San Francisco, CA – September 15, 2025 – TechNova is excited to announce the official launch of NovaBook X, its first AI‑integrated laptop. NovaBook X combines cutting‑edge neural‑processing chips with a sleek, ultra‑light design to deliver real‑time AI assistance for everyday tasks. Key features include on‑device AI‑enhanced photo editing, voice‑activated workflow automation, and adaptive battery management that learns user habits.

"Our mission is to make AI accessible to every professional," said Maya Patel, CEO of TechNova. "With NovaBook X, we’re putting powerful, private AI directly into the hands of users, without compromising security or performance."

For more information, visit https://technova.com/novabook-x.

# TechNova unveils AI‑Powered Laptop NovaBook X

**San Francisco, CA – September 15, 2025** – TechNova is excited to announce the official launch of **NovaBook X**, its first AI‑integrated laptop. NovaBook X combines cutting‑edge neural‑processing chips with a sleek, ultra‑light design to deliver real‑time AI assistance for everyday tasks.

**Key Features**
- On‑device AI‑enhanced photo editing
- Voice‑activated workflow automation
- Adaptive battery management that learns user habits

> "Our mission is to make AI accessible to every professional," said **Maya Patel**, CEO of TechNova. "With NovaBook X, we’re putting powerful, private AI directly into the hands of users, without compromising security or performance."

For more information, visit [TechNova NovaBook X](https://technova.com/novabook-x).

Here’s the press release formatted in Markdown, ready to paste into your internal Slack channel:

---

# TechNova unveils AI‑Powered Laptop NovaBook X

**San Francisco, CA – September 15, 2025** – TechNova is excited to announce the official launch of **NovaBook X**, its first AI‑integrated laptop. NovaBook X combines cutting‑edge neural‑processing chips with a sleek, ultra‑light design to deliver real‑time AI assistance for everyday tasks.

**Key Features**
- On‑device AI‑enhanced photo editing
- Voice‑activated workflow automation
- Adaptive battery management that learns user habits

> "Our mission is to make AI accessible to every professional," said **Maya Patel**, CEO of TechNova. "With NovaBook X, we’re putting powerful, private AI directly into the hands of users, without compromising security or performance."

For more information, visit [TechNova NovaBook X](https://technova.com/novabook-x).

---
